description:
Run your own Electrum server backed by your Bitcoin Core node!
This container deploys Electrs, a fast and lightweight Electrum Rust Server that indexes your Bitcoin blockchain and provides a local Electrum-compatible API.

Make sure your bitcoind container is running and the RPC/P2P ports are reachable by Electrs.

Create an electrs.toml configuration file in your data directory.

Project: https://github.com/romanz/electrs

ports.name: Host Port 1
ports.description: External port 50001 mapped to container port 50001

variables.name: PUID
variables.description: User ID to run the container as

variables.name: GUID
variables.description: Group ID to run the container as

variables.name: UMASK
variables.description: Default permission mask for new files
